txt.en: Return to Zamína with the stories you have gathered from the people in Iridír.
Zamína wishes to write a song honouring people who have fallen in the assaults led by Bârshud II. She would like your help in gathering stories from displaced warriors and citizens nearby.
'These stories are heart-breaking, but will be valuable in my work.\n\n'I thank you for your help. I will now do my best to craft a song worthy of these words to properly honour them.'
'I appreciate what Zamína wants to do. I will gladly tell my story.'
Zamína wishes to write a song honouring people who have fallen in the assaults led by Bârshud II. She would like your help in gathering stories from displaced warriors and citizens nearby.
'I am glad to provide my story.'
'It was a horror. I will tell my story.'
'It is painful to talk about, but I wish to honour those fallen.'

'Hello, [placeholder]. I am sure you have heard of the assaults led by that monster, Bârshud II, here in Ambarûl.\n\n'I wish to help however I can, but my talents are in music. I would like to write a melody to honour the fallen and the injured. Can I ask you to help me speak with people here who have been displaced and try to gather their stories? I can use the tales they tell craft my song.'
Return to Zamína with the stories
'I am sorrry. I do not wish to talk about it.'
'I... I can not. Please, leave me be.'
